Package Server

Class ServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Server.ServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ServerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Handles single user Receives messages from one user Sends messages to many users

      • processLoginOrRegisterRequest

        private boolean processLoginOrRegisterRequest()
                                       throws java.lang.Exception

      • processAddUserToFriends

        private void processAddUserToFriends​(java.lang.String loginToAdd)
        Parameters:
        loginToAdd - nickname of user which will be friend with our userToHandle sends to user that userToHandle wants to add to friends a USER_WANT_TO_BE_YOUR_FRIEND message if that user does not exit then does nothing if users are already friend then does nothing

      • processConfirmationOfFriendship

        private void processConfirmationOfFriendship​(java.lang.String newFriend)
        Parameters:
        newFriend - nickname of user which will be friend with our userToHandle registers both users as friends in database and communicates it to first_user

      • getUserGroups

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        group_names, in which given user is, separated by '#'

      • processCreateGroup

        private void processCreateGroup​(java.lang.String groupName)
        Parameters:

      • processTextGroupMessage

        private void processTextGroupMessage​(java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        text - String in form 'group_name#user#text' sends message to every user that is in the group

      • processAddUserToGroup

        private void processAddUserToGroup​(java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        text - String in form 'group#nickname' if group is not full and group exists then sends USER_ADDED_YOU_TO_GROUP to a user

      • processMessage

        private void processMessage​(ClientToServerMessage message)
        Parameters:
        message - message that was received from user Behaves like multiplexer for messages types calls functions depending on message received
